* 2 stalks lemongrass, bruised

* 1 tablespoon fermented soybean paste (doubanjiang)
* 2 tablespoons soy sauce
* 2 tablespoons oyster sauce
* 2 tablespoons sugar
* 4 cups pork or chicken stock
* 2 cups water

* 2 tablespoons crispy fried shallots, for garnish
